Description: Identification of SARS-CoV-2 related metagenomic mutations based on a single (or a list of) variant(s) file(s)
EDAM_topic: Metagenomics, Gene transcripts, Evolutionary biology, Sequencing, Genetic variation
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Metagenomics, Gene transcripts, Evolutionary biology, Sequencing, Genetic variation
bio.tool_description: Lineagespot is a framework written in R, and aims to identify and assign different SARS-CoV-2 lineages based on a single variant file (i.e., variant calling format).
